name: PYOGON
description:
PYOGON (Play Your Own Game, Or Not) is a game I started developing during the EESI's Game Jam, Ceci n'est pas un jeu (This is not a game), in 2014. In order to create this game, I first wondered: « What is a video game? », « What makes a video game? », and above all « When does the game truly start? ».

PYOGON is a game, which is not actually one. On purpose, I only did the game's interface, which allows the player to create his/her own video game.

Install Instructions

Open the zip folder and click on the index file. The game will be played in your browser. If a message appears just click on "OK".
